block.p: Carrying a swimsuit cover-up for a weekend by the sea can mean one extra piece in an already crammed carryall. So the smart thing is to take a cover-up that has other uses, like an oversize man's shirt or a big cotton pareo that can double as a shawl. Here are some other ideas:

A crinkled-gauze tunic with a hood in black or white by Calvin Klein ($117 at Saks Fifth Avenue) can also go out to dinner over pants. A short dress with a ribbed black top and a black-and-white plaid skirt by Baja Blue ($43 at Lord & Taylor) can go to lunch or shopping in town. A sleeveless black dress with a mesh midriff by Anne Klein ($37 at Lord & Taylor) can go out dancing.
